name: Quantum Covenant
description:
Quantum Covenant is a multiplayer land-and-space dog-fighting sport with full-featured gravity mechanics.

Sling your ship around the arena’s floating planets as you use your grappling hook to launch a ball into the enemy’s goal – or use an array of weapons to destroy the enemy team's ships first!

Join our community Discord here: https://discord.gg/rRtM3Av
